name: Chisos Capital

leaders.bg: Dallas/Fort Worth native, UT Austin dual degrees. Former Bank of America Merrill Lynch investment banker, then Cockrell family office analyst. Founded Chisos in 2020. Pioneered CISA instrument.
hooks: Invented the Convertible Income Share Agreement (CISA)
Raising $10M Fund II after deploying Fund I across 100+ founders
Expanding into athletes and creators

leaders.bg: Wharton School. Met Will Stringer at Emergent Technology Holdings. Full-stack web development.
hooks: Built the tech infrastructure for a novel financial instrument
Wharton-trained technologist

desc: Chisos Capital is an alternative investment firm investing $25K-$100K in entrepreneurs, athletes, and creators using its proprietary Convertible Income Share Agreement (CISA). Founded 2020. Funded 100+ individuals across 35+ US cities. Raising $10M Fund II.

news.h: Chisos Expands Into Athlete and Creator Funding
news.d: Broadened investment thesis to include athletes and creators.

desc: Commercial Loan Broker Association (CLBA) founded 2024 by Terry Luker, Jeff Luker, and Jon Cosentino. Professional association for commercial loan brokers. Annual conferences, weekly webinars, certification program via Academy.
